proposal.fictionalClientDescription: Green Horizon Landscapes is a full-service landscape design, build, and maintenance company serving residential and commercial clients throughout the Greater Toronto Area. With a team of 35, they are known for exceptional craftsmanship, eco-friendly practices, and award-winning outdoor living spaces.
proposal.coverHeadline: Growth-Driven Marketing Solutions for Green Horizon Landscapes
proposal.coverSubheadline: Empowering Your Team to Reach New Heights in Lead Generation and Community Impact
proposal.clientOverview:
Green Horizon Landscapes has cultivated a strong reputation for excellence in the Greater Toronto Area over the past 18 years. Your team’s commitment to environmentally responsible landscaping and stunning outdoor transformations has positioned you as a leader in both residential and commercial markets. With a growing portfolio of high-end residential projects and a long-standing roster of commercial maintenance contracts, you are ready to take your business to the next level.

Your leadership has identified two primary growth goals for 2024: (1) increase qualified residential design/build leads in targeted high-value neighbourhoods, and (2) expand your commercial maintenance division’s visibility among property managers and developers. In support of these goals, you are seeking a trusted marketing partner who understands the unique seasonality, local competition, and high-touch service expectations of the landscaping industry.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
Despite your history of client satisfaction and strong word-of-mouth referrals, Green Horizon Landscapes faces increasing competition from both established firms and new market entrants. Your current website is visually appealing but lacks the conversion optimization and local SEO focus needed to consistently attract qualified leads. Additionally, your digital marketing efforts have been fragmented—social media activity is sporadic, blog content is infrequent, and there is limited tracking of which channels are truly driving inquiries.

You have noticed a plateau in inbound leads, particularly for larger residential design/build projects. Your commercial division relies heavily on networking and personal relationships, but lacks a cohesive online presence that speaks directly to property managers and developers. Finally, your team is stretched thin managing multiple marketing vendors, resulting in inconsistent messaging and missed opportunities to nurture prospects throughout the year.
proposal.opportunitySection:
With an integrated, landscaping-specific marketing strategy, Green Horizon Landscapes can leverage your outstanding reputation to build a sustainable pipeline of high-value leads. By modernizing your web presence, implementing targeted local SEO, and launching consistent, educational content, you will stand out in a crowded market and drive more inquiries from your ideal clients.

Intrigue Media’s industry expertise and proven track record with landscaping businesses across North America make us uniquely positioned to help you achieve your growth goals. Our transparent, data-driven approach ensures you always know where your marketing dollars are going—and which tactics are delivering results. Together, we can empower your team to focus on what you do best, while we handle the end-to-end marketing that drives business growth and strengthens your impact in the community.

recommendedServices.name: Website Revamp & Conversion Optimization
recommendedServices.description: We’ll redesign your website to showcase your portfolio, highlight your unique selling points, and drive more qualified leads through strategic calls to action and user experience improvements.
deliverables: Conversion-focused landing pages for residential and commercial services
Mobile optimization and fast load times

recommendedServices.name: Local SEO & Google Business Profile Management
recommendedServices.description: Boost your visibility in high-value neighborhoods and commercial districts with robust local SEO, citation building, and ongoing management of your Google Business Profile.

recommendedServices.name: Content Marketing & Blog Strategy
recommendedServices.description: Position your team as thought leaders with monthly blog posts, case studies, and educational resources that attract, inform, and nurture both residential and commercial prospects.
deliverables: Content distribution across social media and email

recommendedServices.name: Social Media Management & Paid Advertising
recommendedServices.description: Expand your reach and drive targeted traffic with professionally managed social campaigns and strategic paid advertising on platforms most relevant to your audience.
deliverables: Content creation and scheduling for Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn

recommendedServices.name: Lead Tracking, Reporting & Ongoing Consulting
recommendedServices.description: Gain total visibility into what’s working, with transparent lead tracking, custom dashboards, and ongoing strategic support from our dedicated account managers.
deliverables: CRM integration and conversion tracking setup

implementationPhases.description: We’ll conduct in-depth interviews with your leadership and sales teams, review existing marketing assets, and analyze your competitive landscape. Together, we’ll finalize KPIs and set clear success benchmarks.
Our team will design and develop your new website, implement local SEO best practices, and optimize your Google Business Profile for maximum visibility.
milestones: Local SEO and Google Business Profile live

implementationPhases.description: We’ll roll out your content marketing program, launch social campaigns, and begin targeted paid advertising. Tracking and reporting tools are set up for full visibility.
milestones: First blog post and case study published

implementationPhases.description: Our team provides continuous support, monthly reporting, and quarterly strategy reviews to ensure we’re meeting your growth goals and adjusting tactics as needed.

proposal.timelineTotal: 10 weeks for initial launch, ongoing support thereafter

pricingTiers.description: Best for landscaping businesses seeking a strong digital foundation and essential lead generation tools.
Ideal for teams ready to accelerate lead generation with multi-channel marketing, robust content, and advanced reporting.
features: 2 blog posts and 1 case study per month

pricingTiers.description: For ambitious firms seeking market leadership, brand authority, and ongoing strategic partnership.
features: Quarterly video case studies and podcast production

caseExamples.title: Sun Valley Landscaping: Website & SEO Overhaul
caseExamples.context: Sun Valley partnered with us to modernize their digital presence and attract more residential design/build leads.
caseExamples.result: 2,500% increase in site traffic and a 2,000% jump in organic search leads within 12 months.

caseExamples.title: Gelderman Landscape Services: Multi-Channel Growth
caseExamples.context: We developed a multi-channel strategy for Gelderman, combining web, content, and social to support new client acquisition.
caseExamples.result: Doubled their residential division and achieved hundreds of new qualified leads in the first year.

caseExamples.title: Custom Outdoor Kitchen Concepts: Content-Driven Expansion
caseExamples.context: A boutique outdoor living specialist looking to grow market share through educational content and targeted advertising.
caseExamples.result: Achieved 70% year-over-year business growth and expanded into new neighbourhoods.

proposal.ctaBody: Let’s build a marketing partnership that delivers measurable growth and strengthens your impact in the community. We’re excited to help Green Horizon Landscapes lead the way.

enriched.positioning: Intrigue Media positions itself as a purpose-driven digital marketing agency specializing in helping landscaping businesses across North America grow through tailored, transparent, and industry-specific marketing solutions.
valuePropositions: Industry-specific marketing strategies tailored for landscapers
Transparent, data-driven reporting and clear communication
Proven track record of delivering qualified leads and measurable growth
Dedicated account management and ongoing support
Purpose-driven approach focused on empowering leaders and strengthening communities
differentiators: Exclusive focus on the landscaping industry with deep expertise
Certified B Corporation status reflecting commitment to social and environmental impact
Purpose-driven mission to empower leaders and strengthen communities
Transparent, line-item billing and a 'do what we say or you don’t pay' guarantee
Proprietary Landscape CRM built specifically for landscapers
